newsitem.title: USA: NOTICE OF SALE - Conover, N.C..
newsitem.headline: NOTICE OF SALE - Conover, N.C..

text.p: General Obligation Sanitary Sewer Bonds, Series 1997 Sealed bids will be received by the Local Government Commission of North Carolina at its office in the Albermarle Building , 4th Floor, Room 411, 325 North Salisbury Street, Raleigh, North Carolina 27603-1385, until 11 o'clock A.M., North Carolina Time, such bids to be opened in public at said time and place on said day, for the purchase of $2,500,000 General Obligation Sanitary Sewer Bonds, Series 1997 of the City of Conover, North Carolina, dated March 1, 1997, and maturing (subject to the right of prior redemption) annually, March 1, $125,000 1999 to 2018, inclusive.

Copies of the Official Statement and the Notice of Sale and Bid Form relating to the bonds may be obtained from the Local Government Commission (919-733-3064). Each bid must be submitted on a bid form in the Notice of Sale and Bid Form. The bonds will be delivered on or about March 25, 1997.
